title: The Psychological Hazards of Entwining with an AI Girlfriend
description: In a digital age where technology weaves seamlessly into the fabric of everyday life, the concept of companionship has taken on a new guise with the advent of AI girlfriends. These virtual partners, powered by sophisticated language models such as GPT-3 and GPT-4, offer the allure of unconditional affection, tailored to individual desires. Yet, beneath […]
